amendment.description: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit profiteering and fraud relating to military action, relief, and reconstruction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3292 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 120.

action.text: Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S6696; text: CR S6696) To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit profiteering and fraud relating to military action, relief, and reconstruction.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3292 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 120.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3292 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 120.
